mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reviews WHERE user_number = #{userNumber} and CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}

SELECT r.user_number as userNumber, r.CONTENT_NAME as contentName, r.CONTENT_ID as contentId, r.CONTENT_TYPE as contentType, r.REVIEW_TEXT as reviewContent, r.RATING as rating, u.user_id as userId FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_number = u.user_number WHERE r.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} and r.CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType} order by REVIEW_NUMBER desc
SELECT USER_NUMBER from users where USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (user_number, CONTENT_NAME, CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, REVIEW_TEXT, RATING, CONTENT_IMAGE_URL) VALUES (#{userNumber}, #{contentName},#{contentId},#{contentType},#{reviewContent},#{rating}, #{imgurl} )
